introduction: Fly-posters usually advertise events with posters, stickers or bills that are put up without the permission of the property owner. Fly-posting is a criminal offence. Report fly-posters to your local council or the police. Enter your postcode to find your council's website for more information.
overview: Report fly-posting to your local council - posters, stickers or bills put up without permission of the property owner.
title: Report fly-posting
